movies.title: Buddha 2: Tezuka Osamu no Budda - Owarinaki tabi
movies.plot: 2500 years ago, in India, Siddhartha was born as a prince of the Shakya clan, but he gives up his position as a prince to see the world. He meets a strange boy named Assaji, who can predict the future, a monk with only one eye and Depa. Siddhartha continues traveling. Siddhartha is overwhelmed by the sufferings he witnesses around him. Meanwhile, Prince Ruri of Kosara begins his attack on the Shakya clan.
movies.simplePlot: 2500 years ago, in India, Siddhartha was born as a prince of the Shakya clan, but he gives up his position as a prince to see the world. He meets a strange boy named Assaji, who can predict...

biography.bio: Kiyokazu Kanze is an actor, known for Bouddha - Le Grand départ (2011) and Buddha 2: Tezuka Osamu no Budda - Owarinaki tabi (2014).
biography.name: Kiyokazu Kanze

biography.bio: Kenichi Matsuyama was born in Mutsu, Aomori Prefecture. In 2001, Matsuyama started his career modeling and the following year made his debut as an actor landing a small role in the NTV drama "Gokusen". In 2003, Matsuyama made his film debut in a supporting role in "Bright Future". His major breakthrough was in 2006 with Matsuyama's performance as "L" in the Death Note film franchise. Subsequently, he was nominated for several awards, winning in 2006 the Hochi Film Awards for Best New Actor and in 2007 the Japan Academy Award for Best New Actor and Yokohama Film Festival Award for Best New Talent. Since then Kenichi has performed in a variety of different character driven roles. As of 2010 Kenichi Matsuyama won the Takasaki Film Festival award for Best Actor and 64th Mainichi Film Awards for Best Actor. He is with Horipro Talent Agency.
biography.name: Ken'ichi Matsuyama

biography.bio: Nana Mizuki was born on January 21, 1980 in Niihama, Ehime, Japan as Nana Kondo. She is an actress, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Naruto the Last: Le film (2014).
biography.name: Nana Mizuki

biography.bio: Tetsuo Nakanishi is an actor, known for Just Japan (2007), 24 Hour Television: Love Saves the Earth 37 (2014) and Beat Takeshi no Gachi Battle (2010). He was previously married to Fumina Hara.
biography.name: Tetsuo Nakanishi

biography.bio: Hiromasa Taguchi was born on October 8, 1967 in Fukuoka, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Shall We Dance? (1996), Keishichô sôsa ikka kyû gakari (2006) and Sumo do, sumo don't (1992).
biography.name: Hiromasa Taguchi

biography.bio: Sayuri Yoshinaga was born on March 13, 1945 in Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Kabei: Our Mother (2008), About Her Brother (2010) and The Makioka Sisters (1983). She has been married to Okada, Taro since 1973.
biography.name: Sayuri Yoshinaga

biography.bio: Hidetaka Yoshioka was born on August 12, 1970 in Saitama, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for The Place Promised in Our Early Days (2004), Always - Sunset on Third Street (2005) and La servante et le samouraï (2004). He was previously married to Yuki Uchida.
biography.name: Hidetaka Yoshioka

biography.bio: Shin'ya Ôwada was born on October 25, 1947 in Fukui, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack (2001), Godzilla and Mothra: The Battle for Earth (1992) and Triple Sôsasen (1973).
biography.name: Shin'ya Ôwada

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated Award of the Japanese Academy
